price: Yã kai Annabi! Ka* ce wa mãtan aurenka da 'yã'yanka da mãtan mũminai su kusantar da ƙasã daga manyan tufãfin da ke a kansu. Wancan ya fi sauƙi ga a gane su dõmin kada a cũce su. Kuma Allah Yã kasance Mai gãfara, Mai Jin ƙai.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ قُل لِّأَزۡوَٰجِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِسَآءِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يُدۡنِينَ عَلَيۡهِنَّ مِن جَلَٰبِيبِهِنَّۚ ذَٰلِكَ أَدۡنَىٰٓ أَن يُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
footnotes: * Anã fãra gyãra daga sama, sa'an nan gyãran ya sauko ƙasa, kamar ɓarnar da tã fãru daga sama, sai tã kai ƙasa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu qul li-azwājika wabanātika wanisāi al-mu'minīna yud'nīna ʿalayhinna min jalābībihinna dhālika adnā an yuʿ'rafna falā yu'dhayna wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
